author: s52005807

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Ace Of Spades

http://ace-spades.com/

About

Ace of Spades is a free multiplayer game with voxel graphics and destructable terrain. The gameplay is capture-the-flag style.

Here are some key features:

    Huge randomly generated maps with lakes and rivers
    Dig through terrain – make trenches or tunnels
    Build anything – defensive positions to fortresses
    Realistic gun mechanics including ironsights and recoil
    Dynamic lighting system based on ambient occlusion
    Up to 32 players battling simultaneously

System Requirements:

    Your grandmother’s rig can run this game

replies.author: howard
replies.txt_content:
既然仿MC 也好啊
表示MC是個值得不斷仿冒的人氣遊戲=W=
學校電腦裏幾乎每台都有MC(20%是我灌的=W=)
中文論壇的人氣倒是快比3DM少了
我在3DM發了兩個帖子
結果就升級到中級會員了= =
這裏反映不怎麼熱烈啊T.T
